string-array.name: equations
string-array.item: x = x0 + v0 * t + ½ * a * t^2
θ = θ0 + ω0 * t + ½ * α * t^2
L = m * r * v * sin θ
R = ½ * ρ * C * A * v^2
n1 * sin θ1 = n2 * sin θ2
C = 2 * π * κ * ε * 0ℓ / ln (b / a)
P = V * I = I^2 * R = V^2 / R
FB = q * v * B * sin θ
FB = I * ℓ * B * sin θ
d * FB = I * d * ℓ × B
FB / ℓ = μ0 / (2 * pi) * I1 * I2 / r
∮B · ds = μ0 * ε0 * dΦE / dt + μ0I

string-array.name: equations_variables
string-array.item: ∮B · ds = μ0 * ε0 * dΦE / dt + μ0I
